content.question: Which of the following code segments correctly displays the cost of a ticket?

choices.label: cost <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 6IF ((age > 12) OR includesTour){cost <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> cost + 2}DISPLAY (cost)

cost <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 6IF (age > 12){cost <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> cost + 2}ELSE{IF (includesTour){cost <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> cost + 2}}DISPLAY (cost)
